taskset -c 3 python file1.py --in 130

Explanations about Options.-p: Operate on an existing PID and do not launch a new task.
Explanations about Options.-c:
Interpret mask as numerical list of processors instead of a bitmask. Numbers are
 separated by commas and may include ranges. For example: 0,5,8-11.
